name: Crowne Plaza Zurich Hotel

reviews.text: The exterior of the hotel is dated and the lobby area needs updating. We were in the wing over looking the park which ensured a great nights sleep. The room looked like it was refurbished recently. The bed was perfect for a great nights sleep. The only point we found odd was there was only 1 power point in the room. If we return we would stay here again. We did not have any meals or drinks at the hotel. Overall a near perfect stay.
reviews.title: Great room with comfortable bed that ensured a good nights sleep

reviews.text: It's an excellent hotel with good service and decent rooms. The breakfast is also good. There is a Tram station in a walking distance. The only thing I have against it is the semi-transparent toilet door which does not have a lock.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.text: I am a platinum member of the intercontinental group loyalty scheme and have visited a great many of their hotels across Europe and the rest of the world. As a company with a clear branding system I was flabbergasted to arrive at this hotel - described on their website as being 'a few steps from the tram stop' - far from it when carrying luggage. The staff were brash and abrupt, an additional tax was required to be paid which should be included in the room rate, the room barely managed to contain a double bed (all rooms are the same size) and the email communication prior to arrival was shoddy at best.
reviews.title: Should be a holiday-inn express

reviews.text: I called down to reception for an explanation of my room size when I had been told I had been upgraded. The answer: my window looked out onto a back road not a main road - I was far from impressed.
reviews.title: a good place to stay in Zurich

reviews.text: On one instance, my mother in law - staying in another room booked by me - went to reception because her key stopped working. The desk staff enquired as to my name and date of birth which she gave correctly (I later confirmed that their records were indeed accurate). They said she was wrong and so two members of staff frogmarched her to my room which I was in and they demanded to see my passport. It was an appalling way to treat any guest but as a loyalty member booking multiple rooms in the hotel it beggared belief.
reviews.title: For conferences maybe

reviews.text: I stayed here for 3 nights. The hotel is outside city centre, but only 5 minute walk from a tram stop. There isn't really anything to do or see close to the hotel.
reviews.title: Very modern and stylish hotel but let down by poor location and room design

reviews.text: I had very low expectations of the hotel based on reviews I had read, and was pleasantly surprised when I saw the lobby and the room. It felt like a high quality hotel. Nice toileteries, a decent hair dryer, sleeping aids, a range of hot drink sachets in the room and even a couple of Lindt chocolates.
reviews.title: I've always liked it!

reviews.text: There is free WiFi available at a slower speed. For higher speeds, a charge applies. However we found the free WiFi more than adequate.
reviews.title: Good hotel with comfy beds

reviews.text: The room itself was very small and we found it very difficult to find anywhere to put our 2 small suitcases and backpacks. The was room for one suitcase only on a shelf near the door There were multiple pillows and cushions provided on the bed, and we had trouble finding anywhere to put these if we did not wish to use them all.
reviews.title: Decent but away from the city

reviews.text: The bathroom was through a sliding glass door, less than half a metre from the side of the bed. If the bed side cabinet was moved slightly, the bathroom door would not fully open. This door was also semi transparent, and did not fully shut (there was a 2 inch gap), so there is no privacy in the bathroom. This room was too small to really spend any time in other than sleeping.
reviews.title: An excellent Crowne Plaza hotel

reviews.text: On our trip to Italy we stayed at the Crowne Plaza in Zurich for two nights and had an exceptionally great experience there. The room was great and the service beyond expectation. The food in the restaurant was wonderful in the evening and the breakfast buffet was extremely enjoyable. Room Service was also very prompt and extremely friendly. The baby cod was set up in the room as reserved on arrival and the Front Office staff was very friendly. Overall, it has been great staying at this hotel, and we look forward to plan further trips to Zürich staying there.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: My mother and I stayed at Crowne Plaza Zurich Hotel in June 2007 and were very satisfied. We have found this hotel great and staff polite and efficient.
reviews.title: Outstanding Hospitality and Great Staff as a Result of Excellent Management

reviews.text: Room service, downstairs bar, breakfast area (Alex served us nicely) ... everything has been excellent. And our special thanks to reception employee (a trainee!) Ms. Manuela Camenzind. Since the first moment when we entered the lobby, Manuela gave us a warm welcome, checked-in momentarily, paid extra attention to my mom’s senior age (our room was upgraded), explained how to use internet, parking lot, health area, where to get Swiss SIM-cards for our cell-phones, described how to book an excursion around the city (through a concierge) and where are the best shopping areas located. Ms. Camezind provided us with booklets, local maps and explained main car routes in Zurich. In consideration of our travel needs, she reserved a late check-out at a convenient time, made me feel valued as a Priority Club member, and was very polite and attentive during our whole stay.
reviews.title: Once a Grand Hotel

likes.liked: — Larger room, air conditioning, and nice restaurant

reviews.title: Very nice hotel
reviews.text: I rate my overall experience with Crowne Plaza Zurich Hotel as outstanding. Next time in Zurich, I shall definitely stay at this hotel and I highly recommend the hotel to fellow travelers, who will get the best available service for their money paid.
With sincere thanks to the hotel’s staff, management and HR department
reviews.title: Very bad everything ...

likes.liked: — The business center and conference rooms are OK
likes.disliked: — Outdated and small hotel rooms, location

reviews.text: Good .. nothing special indeed not of a typical CP hotel
reviews.title: Good but lost the crown plaza individuality
Been to better Holiday Inn Express's
reviews.text: Front desk Manager very dictatorial in his discussiins and would not even check corporate booking and made his own policy which has never been applied in any IHG hotel. As a gold ex platinum ambassador member I stay a lot in this group .... never had such attitude or problem
regardless .. London size rooms which are not large but has all the amenities. Clean but not spotless .. toilet bowl had marks and the rain shower head never cleaned for weeks
reviews.title: Nice place, easy to get to the center

reviews.text: bar casual meal staff are friendly and the best bit of hotel .. even before a drink
reviews.title: Treated like royalty
Very Nice Hotel - Not Quite in Keeping with its Location
reviews.text: breakfast system means it takes minutes for a rather miserable young attendant to allow you in the restaurant and then its find your own table free for.all. breakfast acceptable.but certainly not outstanding ..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got a good (for Switzerland) rate on this hotel and stayed one quick night. It's a quick tram ride (less than 10 min) from the Bahnhof, no transfers needed if you walk the last block. The hotel had a complimentary computer in lobby which we needed for a few minutes, so it came in very handy. We also liked the tea/instant coffee in the room. Breakfast was not included so we skipped that. Considering some of the pricier alternatives in Zurich, I would stay here again if I go to Zurich again.
reviews.title: Nice business hotel

reviews.text: For the price in Zurich this is a good budget option - tram and buses are easy to get around and it is only a short ride to the centre. Room was modern and comfortable. As a coffee and pastry in Zurich easily sets you back 10 euros, the price of this hotel is relatively good value.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: Visited during the week end, so perhaps the low occupancy helped. I found competent and friendy staff, nice rooms, good appearance and cleanliness. Perhaps not at the standard of other Crowne Plaza but definitely a good staying here.
reviews.title: Well done

reviews.text: You can feel that Crowne Plaza Zurich Hotel has been around. The lobby is spacious, but not in its best shape. The rooms on the other hand are nicely decorated and up to the standard you expect from a Crowne Plaza Hotel. The breakfast was great, but the restaurant could also use a facelift. The hotel is located 7-8 min walk from a public transportation crossing: Albisriederplatz
reviews.title: Nicely decorated rooms

reviews.text: A hotel outside the city centre,.A hotel with a reasonable size of Lobby and impressive front desk.Good impression at a first look.A very spacious restaurant.and number of items for a complimentary breakfast.Both non and vegetarian can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast.A 24 hours availabilty of front desk.Free internet throughout the stay is certainly a very good added advantage.A fitness centre to keep your self fit.Room Service and bell desk are available at a cost.We wanted salt delivered to our room. salt is complimentary but service charge is CHF 5.So we did not avail the service.This need not be charged by such a good hotel.Front desk --all are o.k except the one who attended me at the time of checkin.She is reluctant to assist.we lost interest to know the things around because she was hostile and not responsive.Wasted our one night.But next day a gentlemen at conceirge from Bhutan was very very good .Because of his guidance we saved time and money.HE IS VERY WELL INFORMED.
reviews.title: A very Good Transit Hotel

description: The Crowne Plaza Zürich hotel is situated in the trendy Zurich West district, 11km from the airport, close to the city centre. The Crowne Plaza Hotel Zürich offers indoor parking for 550 cars. The 365 air-conditioned rooms in modern and contemporary design are kept in warm browne colours. All guest rooms feature flat screen TVs, high speed & wireless internet access, coffee and tea making facilities and a safe. Restaurants at the Crowne Plaza Hotel Zurich include the Relais des Arts and the Letzi Leu as well as the garden restaurant, all serving delicate Swiss and international meals. The Lobby Bar is an ideal meeting place for business or leisure. Guests of the Crowne Plaza Hotel Zürich enjoy access to 2000 square meters of fitness and spa facilities. WiFi internet is available in all rooms. For events & meetings for up to 480 guests, 11 rooms with natural daylight are at your disposal.
